global.title: VermegApp
global.browsehappy: You are using an old browser. Please update your browser for a better experience.

menu.jhipster-needle-menu-add-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

admin.jhipster-needle-menu-add-admin-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

authenticated.suffix:
, you can use the default accounts:
- Administrator (username="admin" and password ="admin")
- User (name username="user" and password="user").

error.dontmatch: The new password and its confirmation are not equal!

newpassword.minlength: Your password must be at least 4 characters long.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password must not be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your password confirmation must be at least 4 characters long.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your password confirmation must be no longer than 50 characters.

E-mail.minlength: Your email must be at least 5 characters long.
E-mail.maxlength: Your email must not be longer than 50 characters.

validation.minlength: This field must be at least {{min}} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field must be less than {{max}} characters.
validation.min: This field must be greater than {{min}}.
validation.max: This field must be less than {{max}}.
validation.minbytes: This field must be greater than {{min}} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field must be less than {{max}} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field must follow the regular expression {{pattern}}.
validation.number: This field must be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field must be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, numbers or email addresses.

error.Size: The field {{fieldName}} does not meet the minimum and maximum criteria!
error.idexists: A new {{entityName}} entity cannot have an id!

file.not.image: The file must be an image and not of type "{{ fileType }}"
